message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.SI. 

The paper presents a novel neural network model for recommender systems that uses an attention mechanism to capture different characteristics of user behavior with respect to potential recommended items. This involves learning user representations that are dynamically updated based on the context of the recommendations. This work is likely to be relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), information retrieval (cs.IR), natural language processing (cs.CL), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and social and information networks (cs.SI).
